ghostPost.title: v1.4.1
ghostPost.html: There was a bug which included private notes written by the agents in the mail sent to customers. This was happening due to the wrong scoping of the messages. The fix was released immediately considering the severity.
ghostPost.excerpt:
There was a bug which included private notes written by the agents in the mail
sent to customers. This was happening due to the wrong scoping of the messages.
The fix was released immediately considering the severity.
